cab.content: m Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,1st December 1919.(Repeated Constantinople under No. 78570. Chief.)(Received 2nd.)16151. Following information from Malleson's telegrams of 28th November and29th November" 1. (Missing group ? Bolshevics) strongly reinforced and again advancing onKizil Arvat. Volunteers also reported having received reinforcements." 2. Merv Agent, 22nd November, reports Merv garrison reduced to 40 rifles,all other troops and transport animals sent to Kizil Arvat front. Two troop, trainswith four guns and many machine guns passed Merv westward, 21st November.Teheran informed."
